name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Travrse - A Modern Library for Your Insight

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collaboratively curate and share valuable insights with the communities you trust.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add your insight to any content with a URL (webpage, PDF, etc) and share with your trusted communities using the Travrse Chrome extension.  Instead of managing multiple conversations across many chat clients about any one piece of content, simply create layered conversations and insights on top of the content within your library.
